title: Tutorial 3 - How make the payment with token exchanging using JaneDoe Finance
content:
Crypto payment gateway JaneDoe Finance allow merchants to accept crypto payment with automatic token exchanging at a favorable rate through 107 exchangers.

Let's say you decide to accept payments only in USDT. And your client has only ETH. He will still be able to make a payment. ETH will be automatically converted to USDT and sent to you in the amount you need.

In this tutorial video you will see how it happens.
